import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; @Component({ selector: 'app-competences', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule], templateUrl: './competences.component.html', styleUrl: './competences.component.css' }) export class CompetencesComponent {}
